sourcesContent:
import "./at.css" export default function At2() { return (

Your attitude is the window to the world

  • See the world with a positive attitude
  • Attitude window starts clear but as we grow - gets splattered by criticism, gets smudged by ridicule from peers, gets smeared by rejection, gets soiled by disappointments, gets clouded by doubt
  • We need to clear the window. Its the individuals job to keep his window clean
  • Even under the worst circumstances you have the power to choose your attitude
  • A happy person is not a person with certain set of circumstances but rather a certain set of attitudes
) }
